targets.rawSql:
select  temperature as "°C"  from weather_data 
 where canton="$Kanton" and city = "$Ort" and dt> now() - INTERVAL 35 MINUTE
order by dt desc
limit 1

select  DewPoint(temperature, humidity) as "Taupunkt"  from weather_data 
 where canton="$Kanton" and city = "$Ort"
order by dt desc
limit 1

select  humidity as "%"  from weather_data 
 where canton="$Kanton" and city = "$Ort"
order by dt desc
limit 1

select  pressure as "hPa"  from weather_data 
 where canton="$Kanton" and city = "$Ort" and dt> now() - INTERVAL 75 MINUTE
order by dt desc
limit 1

select  rain_down_1h as "mm"  from weather_data 
 where canton="$Kanton" and city = "$Ort" 
order by dt desc
limit 1

select  100-clouds as "%"  from weather_data 
 where canton="$Kanton" and city = "$Ort" and dt> now() - INTERVAL 75 MINUTE
order by dt desc
limit 1

select  wind_speed*3.6 as "km/h"  from weather_data 
 where canton="$Kanton" and city = "$Ort" and dt> now() - INTERVAL 75 MINUTE
order by dt desc
limit 1

select  city as luogo, canton as regione, temperature as "°C", pressure as mBar, humidity as umidità,
 wind_direction as "Direzione vento", DATE_FORMAT(dt,"%Hh%i:%ss") as misura  from weather_data 
 where canton="$Kanton" and city = "$Ort" and (time_inserted ) > now() -interval 180 MINUTE
order by dt desc
limit 3

select 
    weather_main as cielo,
    CASE
        WHEN wind_direction >= 337.5 OR wind_direction < 22.5 THEN 'Nord'
        WHEN wind_direction >= 22.5 AND wind_direction < 67.5 THEN 'Nordest'
        WHEN wind_direction >= 67.5 AND wind_direction < 112.5 THEN 'Est'
        WHEN wind_direction >= 112.5 AND wind_direction < 157.5 THEN 'Sudest'
        WHEN wind_direction >= 157.5 AND wind_direction < 202.5 THEN 'Sud'
        WHEN wind_direction >= 202.5 AND wind_direction < 247.5 THEN 'Südovest'
        WHEN wind_direction >= 247.5 AND wind_direction < 292.5 THEN 'Ovest'
        WHEN wind_direction >= 292.5 AND wind_direction < 337.5 THEN 'Nordovest'
    END as direzione from weather_data 
 where canton="$Kanton" and city = "$Ort" and dt> now() - INTERVAL 75 MINUTE
order by dt desc
limit 1

select  temperature as Mittel, 
        temperature_min as Min,
        temperature_max as Max,
        dewpoint(temperature,humidity) as Taupunkt,
        DATE_sub(dt, INTERVAL 2 HOUR) as time from weather_data 
 where canton="$Kanton" and city = "$Ort" and $__timeFilter(dt) 
ORDER BY time_inserted

select  humidity as umidità, 
        (dt - interval 2 hour) as time from weather_data 
 where canton="$Kanton" and city = "$Ort" and $__timeFilter(dt) 
ORDER BY time_inserted

select  pressure as pressione, 
        time_inserted - interval 2 hour as time from weather_data 
 where canton="$Kanton" and city = "$Ort" and $__timeFilter(time_inserted) 
ORDER BY time_inserted

select  100-clouds as Sole, 
        time_inserted -interval 2 hour as Zeit from weather_data 
 where canton="$Kanton" and city = "$Ort" and $__timeFilter(time_inserted) 
ORDER BY time_inserted

select  rain_down_1h as Precipitazioni, 
        time_inserted - interval 2 hour as time from weather_data 
 where canton="$Kanton" and city = "$Ort" and $__timeFilter(time_inserted) 
ORDER BY time_inserted

select  wind_speed*3.6 as vento, 
        time_inserted - interval 2 hour as time from weather_data 
 where canton="$Kanton" and city = "$Ort" and $__timeFilter(time_inserted) 
ORDER BY time_inserted

panels.title: Clicca sulla colonna per vedere valori estremi

panels.description: sort by column clicking on the column by which you want to sort

targets.rawSql:
select  city as luogo, canton as regione, temperature as Temp, humidity as "umidità", wind_speed*3.6 as vento, rain_down_1h as precipitazioni, 
        DATE_FORMAT(dt, '%H:%i') as ora
        from weather_data 
where (dt + interval 30 minute )  > now() and (country= "IT" or country ="VA")
ORDER BY temperature

panels.title: valori estremi

list.definition: select canton  from  weather_data where dt> now() - interval 2 hour and (country = "IT" or country="VA")
list.label: Regione
list.name: Kanton
list.query: select canton  from  weather_data where dt> now() - interval 2 hour and (country = "IT" or country="VA")

list.definition: select distinct city from  weather_data  where (dt> now() - interval 2 hour)  and canton="$Kanton"
list.label: luogo
list.name: Ort
list.query: select distinct city from  weather_data  where (dt> now() - interval 2 hour)  and canton="$Kanton"
